summary: This section explores the intersection of technology with various fields, from internet fragmentation to innovative digital ecosystems. It includes in-depth analyses and critiques of current tech practices, promotes interdisciplinary approaches, and features profiles of influential leaders in tech and design.
excerpt: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
